content: I've never been to a high elevation place before, so I want to be extra prepared. I've been trying to pack more versatile clothing items that can be worn multiple times, like a black dress I wore three times on my trip to New York City, and a pair of leggings that I wore twice on my trip to Chicago. Do you think I should pack clothing that can help with the cold weather and potential altitude sickness symptoms, like layers for cold weather and loose-fitting clothing for comfort?
